content:
Ah, I'd love to help you,
But the axe needs sharpening,
And I have to place it somewhere to do that.
Come back once you've sorted out your things...
(smiles)

One of the Academia's worst nightmares is forgetting research tools,
so keep a spare set of handy tools ready,
and never let that nightmare happen again!

Don't worry. I'll help you put on the new one.
It only costs 1234... what was it again?
Anyway, the new axe is in your backpack.

I've packed all the things you need.
They should come in handy.
